activeTask.name: Favicon Display Issues - FULLY RESOLVED ✅
activeTask.description: Fixed all favicon display issues by adding proper favicon.ico and SVG favicon

faviconFixResults.rootCause: Missing favicon.ico file and incorrect HTML favicon references
problemsIdentified: ❌ index.html referenced /vite.svg instead of LocalPDF favicon
❌ Missing favicon.ico file (required for legacy browser support)
❌ No SVG favicon for modern browsers
❌ Incorrect order of favicon declarations in HTML
solutionImplemented: ✅ Created favicon.svg with LocalPDF logo design
✅ Updated index.html with proper favicon hierarchy
✅ Added all modern favicon formats (ICO, SVG, PNG)
✅ Proper fallback order: ICO → SVG → PNG variants

afterDeployment: ✅ Favicon visible in browser tab for all browsers
✅ Apple touch icon working on iOS devices
✅ PWA manifest icon working for app installations

projectStatusAfterFix.faviconScore: 100/100 - All formats available and properly configured
